00046 class GPC_MouseDevice : public SCA_IInputDevice
00047 {
00048 public:
00052     typedef enum {
00053         buttonLeft,
00054         buttonMiddle,
00055         buttonRight,
00056         buttonWheelUp,
00057         buttonWheelDown
00058     } TButtonId;
00059 
00060     GPC_MouseDevice();
00061     virtual ~GPC_MouseDevice(void);
00062 
00063     virtual bool IsPressed(SCA_IInputDevice::KX_EnumInputs inputcode);
00064     virtual void NextFrame();
00065 
00074     virtual bool ConvertButtonEvent(TButtonId button, bool isDown);
00075 
00085     virtual bool ConvertButtonEvent(TButtonId button, bool isDown, int x, int y);
00086 
00093     virtual bool ConvertMoveEvent(int x, int y);
00094
